title: (x) Sisusta 24 geometric sans logo - ITC Bauhaus {Lari}
content:
The logo is the following.  
I only need to know the font used for "sisusta".

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015032119im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sisusta24_4554.jpg)

Thanks in advance!
author: ozi

comments.content:
The font is: ITS Bauhaus and can be found at [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/bauhaus](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015032119/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/bauhaus "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/agfa/bauhaus")

Happy Thanksgiving!

~ ingternet
